challenge.title: Linear Algebra and Its Applications - Chapter 2
challenge.description: Judi McDonald, David Lay, and Steven Lay's Linear Algebra and Its Applications is an introduction to linear algebra.
challenge.instructions: Use Archive.org E-Reserves to read Linear Algebra and Its Applications, Chapter Two, and complete questions with solutions provided.
